base_url.description: The base URL used to create application integrations.

cors_whitelist.description: Whitelist allowing remote access. Default value allows all origins.

items.description: Regular expression for testing request origin

jwt_algo.description: The algorithm to use for the signature.

jwt_secret.description: The secret passphrase for the signature.

jwt_ttl.description: The time-to-live for a token (1d (1 day), 12h (12 hours), 20m (20 minutes))

jwt_issuer.description: The content for the issuer field.  Just a string that we can check.

log_level.description: Winston log level.  Anything logged above this level will not be in the logs.

log_file.description: File path to which logs are written.

log_errors_file.description: File path to which error logs are written.

password_regex.description: A regular expression that enforces password requirements for users

password_validation_message.description: A validation message returned to users if the password fails validation
password_validation_message.default: Password must be at least 6 characters long

port.description: The port for the HTTP server

public_dir.description: Path to folder holding web-client public assets, absolute or relative to root of repository

security_data_secret.description: 32-byte long secret, Base64 encoded, used to encode network security data

ssl_key_file.description: Path to SSL key file, absolute or relative to root of repository

ssl_cert_file.description: Path to SSL certificate file, absolute or relative to root of repository

ssl_ca_file.description: Path to certificate authority certificate file, absolute or relative to root of repository

ssl_crl_file.description: Path to certificate revokation list file, absolute or relative to root of repository
